smashy 0.0.0-9000
  • Reference

Featureless Density Estimation Learner

Source: R/DensityLearner.R
mlr_learners_density.featureless.Rd

Simple LearnerDensity fallback learner which gives all predictions the density .Machine$double.xmin (typically 2.225074e-308).

# TODO: could make this a hyperparameter.

See also

Other density estimation classes: LearnerDensity, MeasureDensity, PredictionDensity, TaskDensity, as_prediction_density(), as_task_density(), mlr_learners_density.np, mlr_measures_density.logloss, mlr_tasks_faithful
